#summary The ClearCase::Wrapper::MGi module has the ambition to develop as an alternative to UCM.

= Introduction =

[http://www.cmwiki.com/DontUseUcm UCM is bad. It fills however a need. Can we have our cake and eat it?

= Details =

Problems with UCM:
  * Inflexible: components, p- and admin- vobs
  * GUI and opacity
  * Weight and poor performance
  * [http://www.cmwiki.com/UcmObsolete Anti-!ClearCase]

The pros, the needed functionality
  * Baselines, activities, change sets: higher level vision
  * Incremental labeling
